definition: to lose sth abstract but important (courage, authority, one's life etc)/to be bereaved of (one's spouse etc)/to die/disappointed/discouraged
aspect particle indicating action in progress
to make known/to show/to prove/to write/book/outstanding
to touch/to come in contact with/to feel/to be affected by/to catch fire/to burn/(coll.) to fall asleep/(after a verb) hitting the mark/succeeding in
lit. the river that divides Chu and Han/fig. a line that divides rival territories/the mid-line between sides on a Chinese chessboard
to die (idiom)/to breathe one's last/to give up the ghost
lit. crow and peacock make no sound/absolute silence (idiom); not a single voice can be heard/absolute silence
vocal accompaniment in some traditional Chinese operas/to speak in support of/to chime in
to feel guilty as a thief (idiom); to have sth on one's conscience
lit. to point at the mulberry tree and curse the locust tree/fig. to scold sb indirectly/to make oblique accusations (idiom)
smile spread across the face (idiom); beaming with pleasure/all smiles/joy written across one's face
